block.p: BASEBALL American League
CLEVELAND INDIANS--Agreed to terms with OF Kenneth Folsom, OF Rashad Eldridge, LHP Adam Cox and LHP Victor Kleine. Signed OF Robert Womack and C Mike Ernst to minor league contracts.
BASEBALL American League
CLEVELAND INDIANS--Agreed to terms with OF Kenneth Folsom, OF Rashad Eldridge, LHP Adam Cox and LHP Victor Kleine. Signed OF Robert Womack and C Mike Ernst to minor league contracts.

National League PHILADELPHIA PHILLIES--Signed LHP Ryan Carter and assigned him to Batavia of the New York-Penn League. Signed RHP Keith Bucktrot, 1B Carlos Rivera and C Mark McRoberts and assigned them to the Phillies of the GCL. SAN DIEGO PADRES--Agreed to terms LHP Mark Phillips. Purchased the contract of RHP Brian Tollberg from Las Vegas of the PCL. Sent RHP Rodrigo Lopez outright to Las Vegas.
Pacific Coast League CALGARY CANNONS--Signed LHP Erik Plantenberg. Atlantic League ABERDEEN ARSENAL--Signed RHP Derek Gaskill.
BASKETBALL United States Basketball League

FLORIDA SEA DRAGONS--Activated G MArk Jones. Released F Godfrey Thompson. LONG ISLAND SURF--Placed G Patrick Collins and G Lamar Parker on the inactive list. Activated G Brian Ehlers, F John Strickland and F Troy Bowers. NEW JERSEY SHORECATS--Activated G-F Ray Tutt. Placed F Hakeem Ward on the inactive list.
FOOTBALL Canadian Football League

HAMILTON TIGER-CATS--Released DB Larry Moore, DB Jocelyn Borgella, DT Doug Madoski, LB Phillip Thompson, LB Olivier Lefebvre, DL Jean-Daniel Roy, OL Doug Van Moorsel and OL Brad Chalmers. WINNIPEG BLUE BOMBERS--Released DB Jason Dandridge and DB Andrae Holland.
HOCKEY National Hockey League
MINNESOTA WILD--Named Jacques Lemaire coach.
International Hockey League
CINCINNATI CYCLONES--Announced the resignation of John Hamel, assistant director of media relations.
Central Hockey League
INDIANAPOLIS ICE--Re-signed D Dan Cousineau for the 2000-01 season. MEMPHIS RIVERKINGS--Named Doug Shedden coach and director of hockey operations.
OLYMPICS United States Olympic Committee

USOC--Named Benita Fitzgerald Mosley director of public relations programs and Gail Dent manager of public relations programs. Promoted J. Michael Wilson, director-visitor center and community relations, to director of athlete relations.
COLLEGE

BEMIDJI STATE--Named Jeff Mitchell women's soccer coach. CURRY--Named Dan Morgan head trainer. FAIRLEIGH DICKINSON--Named Rich Mosca offensive coordinator. MAINE--Named Jody Bennett and Dana Smith women's assistant basketball coaches. MISERICORDIA--Named Mark Stauffer women's soccer coach and intramural director, Christine Lardon women's basketball coach and coordinator of athletic facilities and Mary Kate Madden field hockey coach and women's lacrosse coach. MISSOURI-KANSAS CITY--Named Dean Demopoulos men's basketball coach. SOUTHWEST TEXAS--Named Donyale Canada coordinator of women's basketball operations. YOUNGSTOWN STATE--Named Andy Johnston men's assistant baseketball coach.
